entry.title: PHP入门小项目——验证码
entry.content:
直接上源代码,相应的函数在代码中有解释

<?php
header('Content-Type:image/jpeg');//以jpg形式输出
$width=120;
$height=40;
$img=imagecreatetruecolor($width,$height);//使用imagecreatetruecolor画一                                                                     //个图像，控制宽度与高度
$image_bg=imagecolorallocate($img, rand(200,255),rand(200,255), rand(200,255));//编写一个图像背景
$array=array('a','b','c','d','e','f','g','h','i','j','k','l','m','n','o','p','r','s','t','u','v','w','x','y','z','0','1','3','6','7','8','9','4','5','2');//创建数组编存放图片中可能出现的字符
$string='';
for($i=1;$i<=4;$i++){
     $string.=$array[rand(0,count($array)-1)];//给图片添加需要输出字符串
}
imagefill($img,0,0,$image_bg);//imagefill 给图片填充背景颜色
for($i=0;$i<=200;$i++){
    imagesetpixel($img , rand(0,119) , rand(0,39) ,imagecolorallocate($img, rand(20,200),rand(20,200), rand(00,200)) );// imagesetpixel给图片添加个单像
																																//素的点，提高难以辨别度

}
for($i=0;$i<=2;$i++){
    imageline ($img , rand(30,$width/2) , rand(10,30) , rand($width/2,$width), rand(10,30) , imagecolorallocate($img, rand(20,200),rand(20,200), rand(00,200)) ) ;//imageline  给图片添加横线，提高难以辨别度

}
imagettftext ( $img, 20 ,rand(5,15), rand(30,40) , rand(30,35) ,imagecolorallocate($img, rand(20,100),rand(20,100), rand(20,100)) , 'Inkfree.ttf' , $string ) ;//imagettftext给图片添加验证码字符
imagejpeg($img);       //输出图片
?>

entry.title: PHP入门之全局变量无法在函数中访问
entry.content:
运行代码

<?php
$a=10;
function add($c,$b){
    $a++;
    return $c+$b;
}
$d=add(3,5);
echo $d;
echo '<br />';
echo $a;
?>

运行报错

Notice: Undefined variable: a in    D:\phpStudy\PHPTutorial\WWW\global.php on line 5
echo $a值为10

修改

加入以下语句，在函数体声明外部全局变量

global $a;

完整代码

<?php
$a=10;
function add($c,$b){
    global $a;
    $a++;
    return $c+$b;
}
$d=add(3,5);
echo $d;
echo '<br />';
echo $a;
?>

entry.title: 简单的前后端交互——php（jQuery-Ajax）
entry.content:
1.Ajax给后端提供数据

代码：

<div><button id="aaa">测试</button></div>
<script>
$(document).ready(function(){
			    $("#aaa").click(function(){

				$.post("./api/captcha.php", 
					{
						name:"菜鸟教程",
						url:"https://www.www.tdyixi.cn"
					},
				function(data,status){
				alert("数据: \n" + data + "\n状态: " + status);
						});
                    });
                });
</script>

注：1.通过("#aaa").click(function()给按钮添加事件。 2.使用.post() 方法通过 HTTP POST 请求向服务器提交数据。
3.function(data,status)为回调函数。
4.切记不要忘了引用jQuery文件。

2.后端接受到数据

代码：

<?php
$name=$_POST['name'];
$url=$_POST['url'];
print_r("我接收到了".$name);
print_r(https://jack-yixi.github.io/post-images/1587041578759.png)
echo "succes";
?>

注：通过print_r打印出所获取的内容，最终并返回success。

3.结果

entry.title: MySQL笔记
entry.content:
一，如何使用终端操作数据库？

增删改查

1，如何查询数据库服务器中的所有数据库？

	mysql> show databases;
	+--------------------+
	| Database        		   |
	+--------------------+
	| information_schema 	|
	| mysql             		       |
	| performance_schema |
	| test              			       |
	| zt                			        |
	+-----------------------+
	5 rows in set (0.00 sec)

2，如何选中某一个数据库进行操作？

mysql> use test（数据库名字）
Database changed
查询：mysql> select * from admin;

3，如何退出数据库服务器？

mysql>exit;
Bye

4,如何在数据库服务器中创建数据库？

mysql> create database text;
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)

5，如何查看某个数据库中的数据表？

mysql>show tables;
ERROR 1046 (3D000): No database selected（一个数据表都没有）

6，如何创建一个数据表？

		mysql> CREATE TABLE pet (
    -> name VARCHAR(20),
    -> owner VARCHAR(20),
    -> species VARCHAR(20),
    -> sex CHAR(1),
    -> birth DATE,
    -> death DATE);

7，查看是否创建成功：

mysql>show tables;
+--------------+
| Tables_in_zt |
+--------------+
| pet                |
+--------------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

8，查看创建好的数据表的结构：

mysql>describe pet；
+---------+------------------+------+-------+----------+-------+
| Field     | Type             | Null | Key  | Default | Extra |
+---------+------------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
| name    | varchar(20) | YES  |        | NULL    |          |
| owner   | varchar(20) | YES  |        | NULL    |          |
| species | varchar(20) | YES  |        | NULL    |          |
| sex        | char(1)        | YES  |        | NULL    |          |
| birth       | date            | YES  |        | NULL    |          |
| death     | date            | YES  |        | NULL    |          |
+---------+------------------+-------+-------+----------+-------+
6 rows in set (0.08 sec)

9，如何删除一张数据表：

mysql> drop table wlb;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)

10，如何查看数据表中的记录？

mysql> select * from pet;
Empty set (0.01 sec)

11,如何往数据库中插入数据记录？

（1）mysql> insert into pet
   	 -> values ('puffball','diane','hamster','f','1999-03-30',null);
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.12 sec)
（2）mysql> insert into pet
   ->（name）values("110");
*/name为已有的/*
+----------+-------+---------+------+------------+------------+
| name     | owner | species | sex  | birth      | death      |
+----------+-------+---------+------+------------+------------+
| puffball | diane | hamster | f    | 1999-03-30 | NULL       |
|          |       |         |      | 1900-02-23 | 0000-00-00    |
|          |       |         |      | 0000-00-00 | NULL          |
| 110      | NULL  | NULL    | NULL | NULL       | NULL       |
+----------+-------+---------+------+------------+------------+

12，再一次查询？

mysql> select * from pet;
+----------+----------+------------+------+-----------------+-------+
| name     | owner | species  | sex  |        birth       | death |
+----------+----------+------------+------+-----------------+-------+
| puffball | diane    | hamster |    f    | 1999-03-30 | NULL |
+----------+----------+------------+------+------------------+-------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

单一查询：

mysql> select * from pet where name=110；
+------+-------+---------+------+-------+-------+
| name | owner | species | sex  | birth | death |
+------+-------+---------+------+-------+-------+
| 110  | NULL  | NULL    | NULL | NULL  | NULL  |
+------+-------+---------+------+-------+-------+
1 row in set, 1 warning (0.00 sec)

13，如何删除数据记录：

mysql> delete from pet where death=0000-00-00;
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)

mysql> select * from pet;
+----------+-------+---------+------+------------+-------+
| name     | owner | species | sex  | birth      | death |
+----------+-------+---------+------+------------+-------+
| puffball | diane | hamster | f    | 1999-03-30 | NULL  |
+----------+-------+---------+------+------------+-------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

14，如何更改数据记录：

update pet name=ok where name=puffball; 
*/把puffball改为ok/*、

15，MySQL常用数据类型：

菜鸟教程查询

16.主键约束

mysql>  create table ren(
id int primary key,
name varchar(20)
);
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.14 sec)
mysql> select * from ren;
+----+------+
| id | name |
+----+------+
|  1 | ???? |
+----+------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)


mysql> insert into ren values(1,'张三');
ERROR 1062 (23000): Duplicate entry '1' for key 'PRIMARY'
mysql> insert into ren values(2,'张三');
Query OK, 1 row affected, 2 warnings (0.00 sec)

mysql> select * from ren;
+----+------+
| id | name |
+----+------+
|  1 | ???? |
|  2 | ???? |
+----+------+
2 rows in set (0.00 sec)

联合主键

mysql>  create table ren2(
    -> id int ,
    -> name varchar(20),
    -> primary key(id,name)
    -> );
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.06 sec)

mysql> insert into ren2 values(1,'张三');
Query OK, 1 row affected, 2 warnings (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into ren2 values(null,'张三');
ERROR 1048 (23000): Column 'id' cannot be null
mysql> insert into ren2 values(1,'张三');
ERROR 1062 (23000): Duplicate entry '1-????' for key 'PRIMARY'
mysql> select * from ren2;
+----+------+
| id | name |
+----+------+
|  1 | ???? |
+----+------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

只要id和那么加起来不相同就可以添加数据

自增主键

create table ren3(id int primary key auto_increment,name varchar(20));
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.24 sec)

mysql> insert into ren3 (name) values('zhangsan');
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)
mysql> select * from ren3;
+----+----------+
| id | name     |
+----+----------+
|  1 | zhangsan |
+----+----------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)

会自动给id排列

17.唯一约束

约束修饰的字段不可重复

1.mysql>create table ren5(
id int,
name varchar(20)
);
mysql> create table ren5(
    -> id int,
    -> name varchar(20)
    -> );
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.29 sec)
mysql> alter table ren5 add unique(name);
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.09 sec)
Records: 0  Duplicates: 0  Warnings: 0


2.mysql> create table ren6(
    -> id int,
    -> name varchar(20),
    -> unique (name)
    -> );
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.09 sec)

如何删除unique

mysql> alter table ren5 drop name;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.12 sec)
Records: 0  Duplicates: 0  Warnings: 0

mysql> desc ren5;
+-------+---------+------+-----+---------+-------+
| Field | Type    | Null | Key | Default | Extra |
+-------+---------+------+-----+---------+-------+
| id    | int(11) | YES  |     | NULL    |       |
+-------+---------+------+-----+---------+-------+
1 row in set (0.01 sec)

modify添加unique？

 mysql> alter table ren7 modify name varchar (20) unique;
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.11 sec)
Records: 0  Duplicates: 0  Warnings: 0

mysql> desc ren7;
+-------+-------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
| Field | Type        | Null | Key | Default | Extra |
+-------+-------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
| id    | int(11)     | YES  |     | NULL    |       |
| name  | varchar(20) | YES  | UNI | NULL    |       |
+-------+-------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
2 rows in set (0.06 sec)

18.非空约束

create table ren8(id int,name varchar(20) not null);
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.38 sec)

mysql> desc ren8;
+-------+-------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
| Field | Type        | Null | Key | Default | Extra |
+-------+-------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
| id    | int(11)     | YES  |     | NULL    |       |
| name  | varchar(20) | NO   |     | NULL    |       |
+-------+-------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
2 rows in set (0.20 sec)

19.默认约束

当没有出传值的时候会给定默认值，传值后不使用默认值

create table ren9(id int,name varchar(20),age int default 10);
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.10 sec)

mysql> desc ren9;
+-------+-------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
| Field | Type        | Null | Key | Default | Extra |
+-------+-------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
| id    | int(11)     | YES  |     | NULL    |       |
| name  | varchar(20) | YES  |     | NULL    |       |
| age   | int(11)     | YES  |     | 10      |       |
+-------+-------------+------+-----+---------+-------+
3 rows in set (0.01 sec)

mysql> insert into ren9 (id,name) values (1,'zhangsan');
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)


mysql> select * from ren9;
+------+----------+------+
| id   | name     | age  |
+------+----------+------+
|    1 | zhangsan |   10 |
+------+----------+------+
1 row in set (0.00 sec)


mysql> insert into ren9 (id,name,age) values (2,'lisi',19);
Query OK, 1 row affected (0.00 sec)


mysql> select * from ren9;
+------+----------+------+
| id   | name     | age  |
+------+----------+------+
|    1 | zhangsan |   10 |
|    2 | lisi     |   19 |
+------+----------+------+
2 rows in set (0.00 sec)

20.主键约束

1.主表classes中没有的数值，副表不能使用

mysql> create table classes(id int primary key,name varchar(20));
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.08 sec)

mysql> create table students(id int primary key,name varchar(20),class_id int,foreign key(class_id) references classes(id));
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.09 sec)

mysql> insert into classes values(1,'张三');
Query OK, 1 row affected, 2 warnings (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into classes values(2,'张三');
Query OK, 1 row affected, 2 warnings (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into classes values(3,'张三');
Query OK, 1 row affected, 2 warnings (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into classes values(4,'张三');
Query OK, 1 row affected, 2 warnings (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into students values(1001,'张三',1);
Query OK, 1 row affected, 2 warnings (0.00 sec)

mysql> insert into students values(1001,'张三',5);
ERROR 1062 (23000): Duplicate entry '1001' for key 'PRIMARY'
mysql>

entry.title: 简单的报名程序(后端)-php——登录篇
entry.content:
1.链接数据库 、设置字符集 、选择数据库

		$con=mysqli_connect("localhost","root","root");
		header('Content-type:text/html;charset=utf-8');
		mysqli_query($con,"use study");

注:study是数据库。

2.去查询用户名是否存在，不存在提示用户名不存在

	$sql="select password as total from wlb where username='$username'";
	$res=mysqli_query($con,$sql);
	$row=mysqli_fetch_array($res);
	if(!$row[0]){
			echo "用户名不存在";
			?>
			<a href="../login.html">返回登录</a>
			<?php

注：通过
$sql="select password as total from wlb where username='$username'";
查询数据表wlb中是否有与用户输入的相同用户名的密码。

3.存在则继续查询密码是否正确，不正确提示密码错误

	}else if($row[0]!=$_POST['password']){
    echo "密码输入错误";
    ?>
    <a href="../login.html">返回登录</a>
    <?php
	}else{

注：通过返回的密码与存在的用户名的密码比对，提示密码是否输入正确

4.密码用户名均正确，则跳转登陆页面

			echo "登录成功";
	?>
			<a href="../succes.html">确定</a>
	<?php
	}
	?>

注：同样html代码不能写在php里面

entry.title: 简单的报名程序(后端)-php——注册篇
entry.content:
1.链接数据库 、设置字符集 、选择数据库

		$con=mysqli_connect("localhost","root","root");
		header('Content-type:text/html;charset=utf-8');
		mysqli_query($con,"use study");

注:study是数据库。

2.拿到字段 用户 密码

	$username=$_POST['username'];
	$password=$_POST['password'];

3.去查询 用户名有没有没占用

	$sql="select count(*) as total from wlb where username='$username'";
	$res=mysqli_query($con,$sql);
	$row=mysqli_fetch_array($res);
	$count=$row['total'];

注：通过查询用户所输入的用户名与数据表wlb中的用户名(username)进行比对，查看是否有记录。

4.根据返回值，判断是否成功

if($count>0){
    echo "用户名已经被占用";
?>
    <a href="../register.html">返回注册</a>
<?php
    }else{
    $sql="insert into wlb(password,username)values('$password','$username')";
    $res=mysqli_query($con,$sql);
    if($res>0){
        echo "注册成功";
?> 
    <a href="../login.html">返回登录</a>

注：如果用户名被占用，这提示被占用，并返回注册界面，如果没有被占用，则以通过。
$sql="insertintowlb(password,username)values('$password','$username')";
向wlb表中添加记录。

<?php
    }else{
        echo "注册失败，后台程序错误";
?> 
    <a href="../login.html">返回登录</a>
<?php

注：如果返回值并非大于零，则为后台程序出现错误，返回注册失败，后台程序错误。
注：html代码不能写在php代码里面。
